h1: Where Every Pet Gets the Royal Treatment
subTitle: Professional pet grooming services for dogs and cats.
faq_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our pet grooming services
reviews_subtitle: See what our satisfied customers have to say about our pet grooming services.

reviews.name: Emily Parker
reviews.text: My anxious rescue dog always comes home happy! The groomers are so patient and gentle. She actually gets excited when we pull into the parking lot now!

reviews.name: James Mitchell
reviews.text: Best grooming salon in Seattle! They did an amazing job on our Golden Retriever. He looked like a show dog when we picked him up!

reviews.name: Rachel Green
reviews.text: I have been bringing my two cats here for years. They handle them with such care and patience. Highly recommend for both dogs and cats!

reviews.name: Michael Davis
reviews.text: The de-shedding treatment is a game changer! My Husky sheds so much less now. The house stays cleaner and he looks great!

reviews.name: Jennifer Lee
reviews.text: They trimmed my Poodle's nails perfectly without any stress. Very gentle and professional. My dog actually fell asleep during grooming!

reviews.name: David Thompson
reviews.text: My cat has long hair and gets matted easily. They were so patient and gentle getting all the mats out. He looks like a new cat!
